import React from "react"; import { SYMPTOMS } from "../constants"; import { DISEASE } from "../constants"; import { SIDEEFFECT } from "../constants"; import { NoverdoseRepo } from '../Api/NoverdoseRepo'; export class Search extends React.Component{ noverdoseRepo = new NoverdoseRepo(); state = { name: '', disease: '', symptom: '', minPrice: '', maxPrice: '', sideEffect: '', drugs: [] } search(name, disease, symptom, min, max, sideEffect) { name = '"' + name + '"'; this.noverdoseRepo.search(name, disease, symptom, min, max, sideEffect).then(returnDrugs => { console.log(returnDrugs); this.setState({drugs: returnDrugs}); }); } render() { return ( <>

this.setState({ minPrice: e.target.value })} />


this.setState({ maxPrice: e.target.value })} />

{ p.name } { p.symptomDesc } { p.diseaseDesc } { p.sideEffectDesc } ${ p.price }
); } } export default Search;
